body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Ross Autoworks. My name is Nicholas Ross. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Judith. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight five five, double five three, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Judith. And may I also have your email address, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Judith?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I'm facing a billing issue and feeling disappointed about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Judith. Let's work together to resolve this. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Your feedback is valuable. Is there any additional information you'd like to provide about the issue?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Judith. I will look into this matter and get back to you promptly. Have a great day!
